GeneralInformation.School Vision: Reflective Learner, Empathic Designer and Inspiring Leader.
GeneralInformation.School Mission: We create a caring, safe and stimulating school environment where each child can grow and glow.  We seek to build in our students a strong foundation in literacy and numeracy, as well as equip them with the attitude, values and 21st century skills to be future-ready and to engage the world while remaining rooted to Singapore.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Every child matters, is unique, and has the potential to make a difference.   Every staff member is an asset, has different strengths, and wants to contribute. Every parent and community partner is a valuable contributor in nurturing the child to G.L.O.W.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: GOVERNMENT SCHOOL / CO-ED SCHOOL / SINGLE SESSION
